snippet: A 19-year-old student and left-wing activist, Clément Méric, died Thursday after being beaten by a group of people described as skinheads in the heart of a Paris shopping district.
abstract: Clement Meric, French student and left-wing activist, dies after being beaten by group of people described as skinheads in heart of a Paris shopping district; seven people are arrested in connection with attack, including the person suspected of hitting Meric.
lead_paragraph: A 19-year-old student and left-wing activist, Clément Méric, died Thursday after being beaten by a group of people described as skinheads in the heart of a Paris shopping district.

headline.main: France: Student Dies After a Beating
headline.print_headline: France: Student Dies After a Beating
